email_text:
Subject: Your Amazon Order Confirmation (#1234567890)

Dear [Customer's Name],

Thank you for shopping with Amazon! We are pleased to confirm that your recent order has been successfully processed and is now being prepared for shipment. Below are the details of your purchase:

Order Number: #1234567890
Order Date: [Insert Order Date]
Estimated Delivery Date: [Insert Estimated Delivery Date]

Order Details:
- Item 1: [Product Name]
  Price: $XX.XX
- Item 2: [Product Name]
  Price: $XX.XX
- Item 3: [Product Name]
  Price: $XX.XX

Subtotal: $XXX.XX
Shipping: $X.XX
Tax: $X.XX
Total: $XXX.XX

Payment Method: [Payment Method Used]

Shipping Address:
[Customer's Shipping Address]

If you have any questions or need further assistance with your order, please don't hesitate to contact our Customer Service team at [Customer Service Contact Information]. Please note that this email is not a VAT invoice.

Thank you for choosing Amazon. We appreciate your business and hope you enjoy your purchase!

Sincerely,
Amazon Customer Service Team
